actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 4089) entitled "A bill for the relief of Robert Jayson, William Jayson, and Jennie Jayson," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims a bill for the relief of named individuals, for further proceedings in accordance with specified law.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 4089) entitled "A bill for the relief of Robert Jayson, William Jayson, and Jennie Jayson," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.
